description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Explore the Solar System in 4 dimensions -- in space and time. Features 40 photos of planets and space, 10 information pages, date browsing between the years 1 through 4000, and more.
